remarks: The set of linear operators between two normed complex vector spaces. (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnoval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
lnoval.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
lnoval.3 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
lnoval.4 $e |- H = ( +v ` W ) $.
lnoval.5 $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
lnoval.6 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
lnoval.7 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
lnoval $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> L = { t e. ( Y ^m X ) | A. x e. CC A. y e. X A. z e. X ( t ` ( ( x R y ) G z ) ) = ( ( x S ( t ` y ) ) H ( t ` z ) ) } ) $.
$d G t $.
$d H t $.
$d R t $.
$d S t $.
$d U t x y z $.
$d W t x y z $.
$d X t y z $.
$d Y t $.
